page.title: 06Fashion.
page.content: Fashion is very important in the 1980's.People often judge you by your appearance so you have to be careful. At the moment the girls are wearing blouses with flowers on and a skirt to match.If they have a great deal of money to spend they wear leather suits.The boys wear jeans and T-shirts in the T-Bag style.T-Bags are shirts ith holes in them and the sleeves cut off. Break Dancers wear shiny tracksuits and basketball boots.Girls sometimes wear a material in the shape of a tube that covers the whole body. Some girls and boy wear make up, long earings with materials in their hair.Some have their hair sprayed to match their costumes. Others dye their hair with a lasting colour.Fashions seem to come and go and if you want to keep up with the trends you have to be quick.
